archimate:Node.name: [L1 CTS] Bulk Processing for prompt processing (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: This is provisioning to support bulk processing for prompt processing. The nodes are typically of a uniform type to help provide understandable timing of prompt codes. Enough nodes are provided to support two "strings" of processing. Idle nodes are donated first to the L1 production system and then to the bulk batch pool, and reclaimed as needed.
